modShortDescription: Updates all of the medical supplies to stack to +5 more than they used to (stacks of 5 are now stacks of 10; stacks of 10 are now stacks of 15).
modDescription:
Updates all of the medical supplies (consumables and ingredients) to stack to +5 more than they used to ([stacks](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-stack-size/) of 5 are now stacks of 10; stacks of 10 are now stacks of 15).

## Changelog

* **_(new)_** Updated to support A19 now. (Official Update)
* Updated for A19 by Doughphunghus.
